song.title: Hesitate
song.info:
Lyrics: What I'm feeling now I can't explain to throw it all away lost lonely in the rain torn up by this incredible pain then mountains fall apart I know it's just the start something there makes me﻿ wait forever to hesitate.
I lie alone at night paint pictures in my mind my mistakes make me blind my anger my thorn in my side and still you make me guess at what I must confess for us to stop the fight and you to make it alright.﻿
